DOC.brief_title: Enhancing Exposure Therapy Post-traumatic Stress Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: This study investigate new brief psychotherapy post-traumatic stress disorder ( PTSD ) , modifies already proven psychotherapy PTSD add two new component modify several others . The goal study determine whether experimental treatment outperform well-established standard treatment . Individuals age 18-65 chronic PTSD randomly assign one three psychotherapy condition : ( ) brief enhanced exposure therapy ; ( b ) standard prolong exposure therapy ; ( c ) delay standard exposure therapy . All study participant undergo phone face-to-face screening assessment determine study eligibility baseline ( pretreatment-Week 0 ) symptom severity . Upon complete treatment , participant undergo three additional assessment visit ( Week 6 , Week 10 , Week 22 ) . During outcome assessment visit , participant complete structure clinical interview battery computer-administered questionnaire .
